property.name: drelephant.analysis.completed.thread.count
property.description: Number of threads to analyse completed(succeeded/failed) jobs.

property.name: drelephant.analysis.realtime.thread.count
property.description: Number of threads to analyse running jobs

property.name: drelephant.analysis.fetch.lag
property.description: Job fetch delay due to the job sending lag from AM/NM to JobHistoryServer HDFS (in millisec)

configuration.property:
drelephant.analysis.realtime.update.interval 3000 How frequently running jobs should be analysed. (in millisec) =======
drelephant.analysis.thread.count 3 Number of threads to analyze the completed jobs
drelephant.analysis.fetch.interval 60000 Interval between fetches in milliseconds
drelephant.analysis.retry.interval 60000 Interval between retries in milliseconds
drelephant.application.search.match.partial true If this property is "false", search will only make exact matches >>>>>>> master
